pci_data_integration_onboarding_descript: Want to integrate data and build data pipelines easily? Automate the flow of your data with our Data Integration solution. You can use a catalogue of sources and destinations to configure the transport of your data, either as a file (Object Storage, HTTP files, SFTP, FTP), a database (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle, SQL Server), or a search engine (Elasticsearch, OpenSearch). Join our free beta by clicking on the button below.
